Validation Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

From the Create or Edit Express VI dialog box, click the Validate button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to view validation test results for an Express VI.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Validation Results—Displays the list of validation tests with a green checkmark next to the tests the Express VI passed and a red X next to the tests the Express VI failed.
  • Description—Displays a description of the validation test you select in Validation Results.
